This is not an investment but a community donation to help us grow ur wealth together selflessly. we advice helpers to use monies they can afford to lose or spare.Donation Path Selection:We provide two donation paths:Donation Path X: Donate 50ghc and in every 0-5 days(weekends exclusive) hope to get 25ghc every week for one month. (4*payment makes one month)After every month Helpers can provide help again of 50ghc to repeat the cycle.Donation Path Y: In this path, what happens is you make a donation of of 100ghc and in every 0-5 days(weekends exclusive) you get help of 50ghc every  week and it's also valid for one month.(4*payment makes one month). To continue receiving a new donation will have to be made to receive again.Contact UsSuper Admin website where we can update Payment manually or automatically whichever is cost effective.

desc: I need a very light and responsive version of my website: it's an instagram klone with user created categories like pinterest.You have to use my existing mysql db because the ios app is also using it.My site was built on abandoned custom framework built on top of  Yii v1. it has too many errors, the custom framework prevents Yii to be upgraded.There is NO need for upload (except for avatar) or registration, because user register and upload from iPhone.Only LOGIN ---- login allow users can add/delete comments, add/delete albums,  like/unlike follow/unfollow, rearrange album, delete/edit post, and edit user profile/avatar, report violation, select album cover.Admins can do everything but also see admin panel to delete or ban users, send message, see modules, add main categories, delete user album.PAGES: (these pages use the same base template)To see the pages download the ATTACHMENTOR do this <===============modify this script [url removed, login to view]it has the same features, pages function like my website except MISSING:grid layout, main categories, user album, select album cover, slideshow and of course template. Suggestion: build on top of current layout because current layout is responsive (for mobile).Remove hide features like user registration and user upload.OR do this <===============This is a repost, I have a laravel version of my site that's 40% finished.Important ===== > Popularity rule or condition. <===============Homepage show popular posts, not newest posts. so the it needs a simple popularity rule:  popular posts based on views, comments, and likes are move up in rank in homepage.But to give newer posts a chance, to show in homepage. We set a time limit for popular posts. we set timer to start countdown from post date/time. after X time, popular post go down in rank.also: nginx rewrite, read/write spit mysql==============================================When You place a bid. Please tell me which one you will do. start from scratch (what framework you will use) ----  OR ---- edit the phpmars script or continue with laravel.Thanks
